category.title: Low levels of staffing
category.description: Limited number of both health workers and teachers which doesn't match the government ceiling for staffing

category.title: Collusion
category.description: An agreement between two or more persons, sometimes illegal and therefore secretive, to limit open competition by deceiving, misleading, or defrauding

category.title: Nepotism
category.description: Favoritism granted to relatives or friends regardless of merit.

category.title: Charging User Fees
category.description: Coercing Service users into paying for the free services

category.title: Poor Infrastructure
category.description: Dilapidated structures in both the health and education sectors

category.title: Theft of Drugs
category.description: Theft of government drugs by hospital staff

category.title: Poor Sanitation
category.description: Bushy compounds at both health centers and Schools, unclean wards and schools and dirty latrines/ latrines

category.title: Negligence
category.description: Failure by public staff to attend to their various duties
